attributes.action: recommend to the Queen the Knighthood of Ryan Giggs OBE, of Man Utd & Wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ryan Giggs is the most decorated British footballer in history, and has played for Manchester United for the enitirety of his career.

Since his debut at the age of 17, Giggs thrilled the country and the wider world with his skill in the game. He has been a role model for the UK's youth, demonstrating professionalism and hard work with all he does.

More recently, Giggs has become a UNICEF representative, using his reputation across the globe to help children in need.

Giggs has recently been awarded an honourary degree from Salford University for his services to football and charity work in developing countries. Giggs now deserves such acknowledgement, that only a Queen can give. A richly deserved Knighthood for an incredible footballer and person.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
